leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-宏基因组与微生物生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 组装→分箱→分类→功能注释→统计→benchmark

unit.unit_name: AI辅助宏基因组注释/预测

queries: [WEB] AI based protein function prediction github
[WEB] metagenomic plasmid virus prediction deep learning github
[WEB] antibiotic resistance gene prediction AI github

tools.name: ProtFAD
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using function-aware domains
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for protein function prediction that incorporates function-aware domains as an implicit modality to enhance prediction accuracy.

tools.name: safpred
tools.one_line_profile: Synteny-aware gene function prediction for bacteria
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting gene function in bacteria by combining protein embeddings with synteny information (gene order conservation).

tools.name: ViWrap
tools.one_line_profile: Viral identification and host-virus relationship prediction wrapper
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive wrapper tool to identify, bin, classify, and predict host-viral relationships for viruses in metagenomic data.

tools.name: FeGenie
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of iron-related genes in genomes and metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for the HMM-based identification and categorization of iron genes and iron gene operons in genomes and metagenomes.

tools.name: MagicLamp
tools.one_line_profile: Targeted annotation of (meta)genomic datasets using HMMs
tools.detailed_description: A platform for targeted annotation of genomic, metagenomic, and metatranscriptomic datasets using curated HMM sets.

tools.name: Genos
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic foundation model for various tasks
tools.detailed_description: A genomic foundation model designed to handle multiple genomic tasks, developed by BGI.

tools.name: HNetGO
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction via heterogeneous network transformer
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing heterogeneous network transformers for predicting protein functions (GO terms).

tools.name: TMbed
tools.one_line_profile: Transmembrane protein prediction using embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting transmembrane proteins and their topology using embeddings from protein language models.

tools.name: SemiBin
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised deep learning for metagenomic binning
tools.detailed_description: A metagenomic binning tool that uses self-supervised deep learning to reconstruct genomes from metagenomic data.

tools.name: MegaD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for metagenomic sample classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for classifying metagenomic samples based on their content.

tools.name: TransFew
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based model designed for protein function prediction, focusing on few-shot learning scenarios.

tools.name: PST
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Structure Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A model that endows pretrained protein language models with structural knowledge for better representation learning.

tools.name: SIFTER
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogeny-based protein function prediction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for large-scale statistical inference of protein function through evolutionary relationships (phylogeny).

tools.name: BeProf
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for deep learning-based protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive computational benchmark suite for evaluating various deep learning approaches for protein function prediction.

tools.name: SDN2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model specifically designed for predicting Gene Ontology (GO) terms for proteins.

tools.name: Prot2Text-V2
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model for protein function prediction utilizing multimodal contrastive alignment between protein sequences and text descriptions.

tools.name: CREaTor
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-cell type gene expression prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting gene expression across different cell types and revealing cis-regulatory patterns.

tools.name: DNABERT-Enhancer
tools.one_line_profile: Enhancer prediction using DNABERT
tools.detailed_description: A fine-tuned DNABERT model specifically for predicting genomic enhancer regions.

tools.name: esm-s
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-Informed Protein Language Model
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that incorporates structural information to improve protein representation and analysis.

tools.name: VIRify
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of phages and eukaryotic viruses
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the detection and classification of phages and eukaryotic viruses from metagenomic and metatranscriptomic assemblies.

tools.name: InstructPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-instruction tuned protein language model
tools.detailed_description: A large protein language model trained to follow structure-based instructions for enhanced protein analysis tasks.

tools.name: InterPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable features in Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for discovering and analyzing interpretable features within protein language models using sparse autoencoders.

tools.name: GENERanno
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic Foundation Model for Metagenomic Annotation
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model specifically designed for the annotation of metagenomic data, enabling high-throughput functional assignment.

tools.name: GENERator
tools.one_line_profile: Long-Context Generative Genomic Foundation Model
tools.detailed_description: A generative genomic foundation model capable of handling long contexts for sequence generation and analysis.

tools.name: ProtHGT
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using Heterogeneous Graph Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A model leveraging Heterogeneous Graph Transformers (HGT) and biological knowledge graphs for protein function prediction.

tools.name: EGPDI
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-DNA binding site identification
tools.detailed_description: A tool for identifying protein-DNA binding sites based on multi-view graph embedding fusion.

tools.name: HyenaDNA
tools.one_line_profile: Long-range genomic foundation model
tools.detailed_description: A genomic foundation model built with the Hyena operator, capable of processing very long DNA sequences for various genomic tasks.

tools.name: TopEC
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using structures and deep graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for predicting protein functions (EC numbers) by integrating protein structural information with deep graph neural networks.

tools.name: ProtFlash
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight protein language model for efficient representation
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight protein language model designed to generate protein embeddings efficiently, suitable for downstream tasks like function prediction and classification.

tools.name: AMR_prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning framework for antibiotic resistance prediction
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning framework designed to predict antibiotic resistance traits and identify unknown resistance genes in bacterial strains.

tools.name: SeisUnix
tools.one_line_profile: Seismic data processing and research package
tools.detailed_description: The CWP/SU: Seismic Un*x Package is a free open seismic processing, research, and educational software package for geophysics.

tools.name: protein-variants-generation
tools.one_line_profile: Generative models for protein variant creation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of generative models including HMM, VAE, ESM-2, and ProtGPT2 for generating protein variants.

tools.name: MARVEL
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic analysis and retrieval of viral elements
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the prediction and retrieval of bacteriophage sequences from metagenomic data using a random forest approach.

tools.name: XAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-engine framework for antimicrobial peptide discovery
tools.detailed_description: An ESM-2 and Transformer-based framework for discovering antimicrobial peptides, specifically applied to deep-sea peptidomes.

tools.name: LucaVirus
tools.one_line_profile: Unified genome-protein language model for viruses
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for modeling the evolutionary and functional landscape of viruses using a unified genome-protein language model.

tools.name: DNABERT-2
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient foundation model for multi-species genomes
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for multi-species genomes that provides efficient DNA embeddings and benchmarking capabilities.

tools.name: DNABERT_S
tools.one_line_profile: Species-aware DNA embedding model
tools.detailed_description: A genome foundation model designed to learn species-aware DNA embeddings for improved genomic analysis.

tools.name: GERM
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and low-cost genomic foundation models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for training genomic foundation models efficiently by utilizing outlier removal techniques.

tools.name: GenoArmory
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for adversarial attacks on genomic models
tools.detailed_description: A unified evaluation framework designed to assess the robustness of genomic foundation models against adversarial attacks.

tools.name: xai-proteins
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable AI for protein transformer models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing and interpreting the inner workings of transformer models applied to protein function prediction.

tools.name: deepbgc
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for BGC detection and classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for the detection and classification of Biosynthetic Gene Clusters (BGCs) in genomic sequences.

tools.name: DeepMicrobes
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classification for metagenomics using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for taxonomic classification of metagenomic reads, enabling precise identification of microbial species.

tools.name: mykrobe
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid antibiotic resistance prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast antibiotic resistance prediction and species identification from raw sequencing data.

tools.name: CodonFM
tools.one_line_profile: Codon-resolution language models for protein-coding sequences
tools.detailed_description: A family of language models trained on codon sequences to capture biological information at codon resolution across diverse species.

tools.name: NodeCoder
tools.one_line_profile: Graph CNN framework for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A general framework utilizing graph convolutional neural networks for predicting protein functions based on interaction networks.

tools.name: TFBS-Finder
tools.one_line_profile: DNABERT-based model for TFBS prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model based on DNABERT for predicting Transcription Factor Binding Sites (TFBS) in DNA sequences.

tools.name: ProLLaMA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Large Language Model for multi-task processing
tools.detailed_description: A Large Language Model specifically adapted for protein language processing tasks, enabling multi-task capabilities in protein analysis.

tools.name: paccmann_proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: PaccMann models for protein language modeling
tools.detailed_description: A collection of models for protein language modeling within the PaccMann framework, useful for proteomics applications.

tools.name: proseLM
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-conditioned protein language models
tools.detailed_description: Protein language models adapted for structure-conditioned design, facilitating the generation of proteins with specific structural properties.

tools.name: InterLabelGO+
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction with label correlations
tools.detailed_description: A method for protein function prediction that explicitly models and unravels correlations between Gene Ontology (GO) labels.

tools.name: ProFun
tools.one_line_profile: Library of models for Protein Function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library containing models for protein function prediction, developed as part of a top-performing solution in the CAFA5 challenge.

tools.name: SeqDance
tools.one_line_profile: Biophysics-informed protein language models
tools.detailed_description: Code for SeqDance/ESMDance, implementing biophysics-informed protein language models for enhanced protein analysis.

tools.name: FEDKEA
tools.one_line_profile: Enzyme annotation using fine-tuned ESM-2 and KNN
tools.detailed_description: A tool for enzyme annotation that combines fine-tuned ESM-2 protein language models with distance-based K-Nearest Neighbors.

tools.name: ProteinLM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Language Model implementation
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model implementation for learning protein representations.

tools.name: DeepPBI-KG
tools.one_line_profile: Phage-bacteria interaction prediction using key genes
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for predicting interactions between phages and bacteria, focusing on key gene features.

tools.name: iEnhancer-DCLA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for enhancer identification and strength prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method (iEnhancer-DCLA) using CNN, BiLSTM, and attention mechanisms to identify DNA enhancers and predict their strength.

tools.name: DisoFLAG
tools.one_line_profile: Protein intrinsic disorder and function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurate prediction of protein intrinsic disorder and its functions using a graph-based interaction protein language model.

tools.name: graphamr
tools.one_line_profile: Antibiotic prediction from metagenome assembly graphs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting antibiotic resistance directly from metagenome assembly graphs.

tools.name: Ankh
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized Protein Language Model
tools.detailed_description: An optimized protein language model designed for efficient and accurate protein representation learning.

tools.name: ProtTrans
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art pretrained protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A collection of state-of-the-art pretrained language models for proteins, trained on high-performance computing infrastructure.

tools.name: MTB-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: CNN models for M. tuberculosis antibiotic resistance prediction
tools.detailed_description: Convolutional Neural Network models specifically designed for predicting antibiotic resistance in Mycobacterium tuberculosis genomes.

tools.name: RMPrediction
tools.one_line_profile: Antibiotic resistance prediction from MALDI-TOF spectra
tools.detailed_description: A library for automatic antibiotic resistance prediction in Klebsiella pneumoniae based on MALDI-TOF mass spectra analysis.

tools.name: ProSST
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid language model for directed protein evolution
tools.detailed_description: An advanced hybrid language model designed to assist in directed protein evolution tasks.

tools.name: LowNSAE
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Autoencoders for Low-N Protein Function Prediction and Design
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation using sparse autoencoders specifically designed for protein function prediction and design tasks where training data is limited (Low-N).

tools.name: distillR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for distilling functional annotations of bacterial genomes and metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to process and summarize (distill) functional annotations from bacterial genomes and metagenomic data, facilitating the interpretation of complex functional profiles.

tools.name: geNomad
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of mobile genetic elements in sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the identification and classification of mobile genetic elements (plasmids and viruses) in genomic and metagenomic sequencing data, utilizing neural networks for high accuracy.

tools.name: RGI
tools.one_line_profile: Resistance Gene Identifier for predicting resistomes
tools.detailed_description: Software to predict antibiotic resistance genes (resistomes) from protein or nucleotide data, including metagenomics data, based on homology and SNP models using the CARD database.

tools.name: micronota
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation pipeline for microbial genomes and metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: An open-source pipeline for annotating microbial genomes and metagenomes, integrating various tools to predict gene features and functions.

tools.name: Metagenomic-DeepFRI
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for protein function prediction using DeepFRI on metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to search and align contact maps for proteins and run DeepFRI's Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) for predicting protein functions, specifically tailored for metagenomic datasets.

tools.name: Sfcnn
tools.one_line_profile: 3D CNN based scoring function for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function model utilizing 3D convolutional neural networks to predict the binding affinity between proteins and ligands, aiding in drug discovery and interaction analysis.

tools.name: SPROF-GO
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using pretrained language models and label diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate tool for predicting protein functions (GO terms) directly from sequence data, leveraging pretrained protein language models and homology-based label diffusion techniques.

tools.name: efficient-evolution
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient evolution from protein language models
tools.detailed_description: Algorithms and tools for performing efficient evolutionary inference and protein engineering tasks using protein language models.

tools.name: evolocity
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary velocity analysis with protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating evolutionary velocity in protein sequence space using protein language models, enabling the study of evolutionary trajectories and dynamics.

tools.name: DPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion Protein Language Models for protein design
tools.detailed_description: A family of diffusion-based protein language models designed for generative tasks such as protein sequence design and structure modeling.

tools.name: GEMS
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Binding Affinity Prediction with GNN and PLMs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for predicting protein-ligand binding affinity that combines Graph Neural Networks (GNN) with transfer learning from Protein Language Models (PLMs).

tools.name: ProDAR
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamics-informed protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Protein Dynamically Activated Residues (ProDAR), a method that incorporates protein dynamics information to improve function prediction and annotation.

tools.name: CheckM2
tools.one_line_profile: Assessing the quality of metagenome-derived genome bins using machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for assessing the quality (completeness and contamination) of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) using machine learning models, improving upon the original CheckM.

tools.name: EukMetaSanity
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation pipeline for eukaryotic metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline dedicated to the structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic genomes recovered from metagenomic data (MAGs).

tools.name: RNN-VirSeeker
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for identification of viral contigs
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool (RNN) for identifying viral contigs, particularly effective for short sequences in metagenomic data.

tools.name: Frame2seq
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-conditioned masked language modeling for protein sequence design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model for protein sequence design that uses structure-conditioned masked language modeling to generate sequences fitting a target backbone structure.

tools.name: DeepNano
tools.one_line_profile: Nanobody–antigen interaction prediction with prompt-based PLMs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting interactions between nanobodies and antigens using ensemble deep learning and prompt-based protein language models.

tools.name: DepoScope
tools.one_line_profile: ESM-2 based detection of phage depolymerases
tools.detailed_description: A fine-tuned ESM-2 protein language model specifically designed to accurately detect and annotate phage depolymerase enzymes in genomic data.

tools.name: S-PLM
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware Protein Language Model
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that integrates structural information via contrastive learning between sequence and structure, enhancing representation learning for protein tasks.

tools.name: pepfeature
tools.one_line_profile: Feature calculation for protein sequences and epitope prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for calculating physicochemical and sequence-based features of proteins and peptides, specifically tailored for epitope prediction tasks.

tools.name: brick
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive data visualisation for bacterial genome annotations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for creating BRIG-like interactive visualizations for bacterial genome annotations and comparisons, facilitating genomic data exploration.

tools.name: evo
tools.one_line_profile: Biological foundation modeling from molecular to genome scale
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework and set of foundation models for biological sequence analysis, covering scales from individual molecules to entire genomes.

tools.name: ESM
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary Scale Modeling: Pretrained language models for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A collection of state-of-the-art pretrained protein language models (ESM-1b, ESM-2, ESMFold) for predicting protein structure, function, and other properties from sequence.

tools.name: DeePVP
tools.one_line_profile: Identification and classification of phage virion proteins
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for the identification and classification of phage virion proteins (PVPs) from sequence data.

tools.name: DeepARG
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based approach to predict Antibiotic Resistance Genes (ARGs) from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: DeepARG is a deep learning tool designed to predict Antibiotic Resistance Genes (ARGs) from metagenomic data. It offers two models: deepARG-SS for short reads and deepARG-LS for long reads, enabling robust annotation of resistomes.

tools.name: DeepARG 2.0
tools.one_line_profile: Updated DeepARG model using deep semantic representation for ARG prediction
tools.detailed_description: DeepARG 2.0 improves upon the original DeepARG by utilizing deep semantic representations to predict Antibiotic Resistance Genes, enhancing the accuracy of metagenomic resistome profiling.

tools.name: entexBERT
tools.one_line_profile: DNABERT model fine-tuned for ENTEx data
tools.detailed_description: A specialized version of the DNABERT model developed by the Gerstein Lab, fine-tuned for the ENTEx (Epigenetics of Non-coding Transcripts and Expression) project to analyze genomic sequences.

tools.name: METL
tools.one_line_profile: Mutational Effect Transfer Learning framework for protein language models
tools.detailed_description: METL (Mutational Effect Transfer Learning) is a framework designed for pretraining and finetuning biophysics-informed protein language models, specifically focusing on predicting mutational effects.

tools.name: S3V2_IDEAS_ESMP
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for epigenetic state modeling and peak normalization
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing S3norm version 2 for normalizing epigenomic signals and IDEAS for epigenetic state modeling, facilitating integrative analysis of epigenomic data.

tools.name: Helical
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for pre-trained bio foundation models on genomics and transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: Helical is a framework designed to facilitate the use and development of state-of-the-art pre-trained biological foundation models, specifically targeting genomics and transcriptomics modalities.

tools.name: ProGen2-finetuning
tools.one_line_profile: Finetuning scripts for ProGen2 protein language model
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for finetuning the ProGen2 protein language model, enabling the generation of protein sequences tailored to selected protein families.

tools.name: TemStaPro
tools.one_line_profile: Protein thermostability prediction using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: TemStaPro is a software tool that predicts protein thermostability by utilizing sequence representations derived from protein language models.

tools.name: Nucleotide Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation Models for Genomics & Transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of foundation models pre-trained on large-scale nucleotide sequences, designed to perform various downstream tasks in genomics and transcriptomics such as promoter prediction and variant effect prediction.

tools.name: Mykrobe predictor
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid antibiotic resistance prediction from sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Mykrobe predictor provides fast antibiotic resistance predictions from raw sequencing data, designed to run efficiently on standard laptops.

tools.name: DNABERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained BERT model for DNA language representation
tools.detailed_description: DNABERT is a pre-trained Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers (BERT) model specifically designed for DNA sequences, enabling the capture of global and local genomic context for downstream tasks.

tools.name: DeepVirFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-free virus identification from metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: DeepVirFinder uses deep learning to identify viral sequences in metagenomic data without relying on reference genomes, improving detection of novel viruses.

tools.name: TransFun
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: TransFun utilizes Transformer architectures to predict protein functions, leveraging the attention mechanism to capture complex sequence dependencies relevant to functional annotation.

tools.name: Distillation-DNABERT-Promoter
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge distillation of DNABERT for promoter identification
tools.detailed_description: A tool that applies knowledge distillation techniques (DistilBERT and MiniLM) to the DNABERT model, creating lighter and faster models specifically for the task of promoter identification.

tools.name: Viral Protein Function PLM
tools.one_line_profile: Viral protein family functional prediction using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the function of viral protein families by leveraging embeddings from protein language models, aiding in the characterization of viral metagenomes.

tools.name: DeepPurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning Toolkit for Drug-Target Interaction and Protein Function Prediction
tools.detailed_description: DeepPurpose is a comprehensive deep learning toolkit for drug discovery tasks, including Drug-Target Interaction (DTI) prediction, drug property prediction, and protein function prediction.

tools.name: GO2Sum
tools.one_line_profile: Summarizer for GO term annotations using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: GO2Sum generates human-readable summaries from Gene Ontology (GO) term annotations produced by protein function prediction methods, helping to interpret complex annotation results.

tools.name: pLM-BLAST
tools.one_line_profile: Remote homology detection via protein language model representations
tools.detailed_description: pLM-BLAST detects remote homology between proteins by comparing representations generated by protein language models, offering higher sensitivity than sequence-based alignment methods.

tools.name: DeepMAsED
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for Metagenome Assembly Error Detection
tools.detailed_description: DeepMAsED identifies errors in metagenome assemblies using deep learning, helping to improve the quality of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: resmico
tools.one_line_profile: Identifying misassemblies in metagenomes via deep learning
tools.detailed_description: Resmico is a deep learning framework for detecting misassemblies in metagenomic contigs, improving the reliability of downstream analyses like binning.

tools.name: PLM-interact
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting protein-protein interactions using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: PLM-interact extends protein language models to predict protein-protein interactions (PPIs) directly from sequence data.

tools.name: ProGen (Jax)
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of ProGen protein language model in Jax
tools.detailed_description: A Jax implementation of ProGen, a language model for protein generation, allowing for efficient training and sampling of novel protein sequences.

tools.name: esmdiff
tools.one_line_profile: Structure Language Models for Protein Conformation Generation
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for generating protein conformations using structure language models, leveraging diffusion processes and ESM embeddings.

tools.name: ConFit
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive fitness learning for proteins
tools.detailed_description: ConFit reprograms protein language models using contrastive fitness learning to predict protein fitness landscapes with limited data (low-N learning).

tools.name: Struct2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using Graph pooling and AlphaFold2 structures
tools.detailed_description: Struct2GO predicts protein functions by integrating AlphaFold2-predicted structural information with graph pooling algorithms.

tools.name: BioFM Eval
tools.one_line_profile: Library to extract embeddings for DNA sequences using BioFM
tools.detailed_description: A library provided by M42 Health to extract embeddings from DNA sequences using their BioFM genomics foundation model, facilitating downstream genomic analysis.

tools.name: DNALONGBENCH
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for evaluating DNA foundation models on long-range dependencies
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the performance of DNA foundation models specifically on tasks requiring the capture of long-range genomic dependencies.

tools.name: ATLAS
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive metagenome analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: ATLAS is a user-friendly workflow that automates the analysis of metagenomic data, from quality control and assembly to binning and annotation, using Snakemake.

tools.name: Metagenomics-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable workflow for short and long read metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: The Metagenomics-Toolkit is a scalable, data-agnostic Nextflow workflow for analyzing both short (Illumina) and long (Nanopore) metagenomic reads.

tools.name: ProstT5
tools.one_line_profile: Bilingual Language Model for Protein Sequence and Structure
tools.detailed_description: ProstT5 is a protein language model capable of translating between protein sequences and structures (Foldseek sequences), enabling structure-aware sequence analysis.

tools.name: SeqVec
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning embeddings for Protein Sequences (ELMo)
tools.detailed_description: SeqVec generates continuous vector representations (embeddings) for protein sequences using an ELMo-based deep learning model, capturing biophysical properties for downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: NMDC Metagenome Annotation
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome Annotation Workflow by NMDC
tools.detailed_description: The official Metagenome Annotation Workflow used by the National Microbiome Data Collaborative (NMDC), providing a standardized pipeline for functional annotation of metagenomic contigs.

tools.name: peft_proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: LoRA fine-tuning adapters for protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A library for applying Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) to protein language models, enabling efficient fine-tuning for downstream proteomics tasks such as function prediction and property estimation.

tools.name: ProtNote
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal deep learning model for text-based protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal model that leverages free-form text descriptions to enable both supervised and zero-shot protein function prediction, facilitating annotation of proteins using natural language.

tools.name: USPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep protein language model for signal peptide prediction
tools.detailed_description: An unbiased, organism-agnostic, and highly sensitive signal peptide predictor that utilizes deep protein language models to identify signal peptides in protein sequences.

tools.name: mothur
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive software package for microbial ecology community
tools.detailed_description: A single piece of open-source, expandable software to fill the bioinformatics needs of the microbial ecology community, widely used for analyzing 16S rRNA gene sequences and metagenomic data.

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembly and binning of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the assembly, binning, and annotation of metagenomes, facilitating the reconstruction of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: CaLM
tools.one_line_profile: Codon-aware protein language model trained on DNA
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model trained on coding DNA sequences, capturing codon-level information to improve protein representation and prediction tasks.

tools.name: esm2quinox
tools.one_line_profile: JAX/Equinox implementation of ESM2 protein language model
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the ESM2 protein language model using the Equinox and JAX libraries, enabling high-performance inference and training on TPU/GPU hardware.

tools.name: FAPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient PyTorch implementation of protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A drop-in efficient PyTorch implementation of protein language models, optimized for speed and memory usage during training and inference.

tools.name: PanSpace
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding-based indexing for bacterial pan-genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing embedding-based indexing for compact storage and rapid querying of bacterial pan-genomes, facilitating comparative genomics and metagenomic analysis.

tools.name: FFPredGAN
tools.one_line_profile: GAN-based protein function prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool that improves protein function prediction by generating synthetic feature samples using Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to address data scarcity.

tools.name: STRING2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Network-based protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: Predicts protein function based on protein-protein interaction network topology using deep maxout neural networks.

tools.name: AbMap
tools.one_line_profile: Antibody-specific protein language model
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model customized for antibodies to learn antibody-specific representations for tasks like structure prediction and binding affinity estimation.

tools.name: ProVis
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretability tool for protein language models
tools.detailed_description: Code for interpreting attention mechanisms in protein language models, applying 'BERTology' concepts to biology to understand what models learn about protein structure and function.

tools.name: VAE_protein_function
tools.one_line_profile: Variational autoencoder for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implements a variational autoencoder (VAE) to predict protein function from sequence data, leveraging latent space representations.

tools.name: ConPLex
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target interaction prediction using contrastive learning
tools.detailed_description: Adapts protein language models and contrastive learning techniques to achieve highly accurate predictions of drug-target interactions.

tools.name: esmologs
tools.one_line_profile: Local homology search using ESM-2 embeddings
tools.detailed_description: Performs local homology searches by leveraging ESM-2 language model embeddings alongside Foldseek, HH-suite, and HMMER for sensitive sequence detection.

tools.name: ShotMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Shotgun Metagenome Annotation Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the annotation of shotgun metagenomic data, facilitating the functional and taxonomic characterization of microbial communities.

tools.name: PlasFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Plasmid sequence prediction in metagenomic assemblies
tools.detailed_description: Software designed to predict and identify plasmid sequences within metagenomic assembly data using neural networks.

tools.name: MetaEuk
tools.one_line_profile: Gene discovery and annotation for eukaryotic metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A sensitive, high-throughput tool for gene discovery and annotation specifically tailored for large-scale eukaryotic metagenomics datasets.

tools.name: GCN-for-Structure-and-Function
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised embeddings for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: Code implementing Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) to generate unsupervised embeddings for predicting protein structure and function.

tools.name: prose
tools.one_line_profile: Protein sequence embedding models
tools.detailed_description: Multi-task and masked language model-based protein sequence embedding models for learning representations of protein sequences.

tools.name: NetSolP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein solubility prediction using language models
tools.detailed_description: Predicts the solubility and usability for purification of proteins expressed in E. coli using features derived from protein language models.

tools.name: EcoFoldDB
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-guided functional annotation pipeline for metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A database and pipeline for protein structure-guided annotations of ecologically relevant functions at the metagenome scale, integrating structure prediction with functional analysis.

tools.name: PGPg_finder
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Plant-Growth Promotion Genes annotation
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool offering workflows for genome and metagenome annotation of Plant-Growth Promotion Genes (PGPg), designed for flexibility in agricultural microbiome research.

tools.name: ProMEP
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-shot prediction of mutation effects on protein function
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal deep representation learning model for zero-shot prediction of mutation effects on protein function, aiding in protein engineering and variant analysis.

tools.name: Evolla
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-language generative model (ProteinChat)
tools.detailed_description: A frontier protein-language generative model designed to decode the molecular language of proteins, enabling interactive tasks and sequence generation.

tools.name: ProTrek
tools.one_line_profile: Trimodal protein language model for exploring the protein universe
tools.detailed_description: ProTrek is a trimodal protein language model that integrates sequence, structure, and textual descriptions to predict protein properties and functions. It aims to illuminate the protein universe by leveraging contrastive learning across these modalities.

tools.name: SaProt
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware protein language model using Foldseek alphabet
tools.detailed_description: SaProt is a large-scale protein language model that incorporates structural information using a structural alphabet (AA+3Di) derived from Foldseek. It significantly outperforms sequence-only models in protein structure and function prediction tasks.

tools.name: SaprotHub
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly platform for accessing SaProt protein language models
tools.detailed_description: SaprotHub provides an accessible interface (via Jupyter Notebooks/Colab) for biologists to utilize the SaProt protein language model for various downstream tasks without requiring extensive programming expertise.

tools.name: ProteinCLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning framework for protein and natural language models
tools.detailed_description: ProteinCLIP harmonizes protein language models with natural language models using contrastive learning, enabling text-based retrieval and classification of protein sequences.

tools.name: EVO2-Virus
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for predicting virus host specificity
tools.detailed_description: EVO2-Virus (EVO2-500M) is a pre-trained deep learning model designed to predict the host specificity of eukaryote-infecting viruses based on their cDNA sequences.

tools.name: gLM
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic language model for predicting protein co-regulation and function
tools.detailed_description: gLM is a genomic language model that learns representations from metagenomic data to predict protein co-regulation, function, and operon structures.

tools.name: Graph2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based representation learning for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: Graph2GO is a method that utilizes graph-based representation learning to predict protein functions (Gene Ontology terms) by integrating protein sequence and interaction network information.

tools.name: DeepGraphGO
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network for large-scale protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: DeepGraphGO employs graph neural networks to perform large-scale, multispecies protein function prediction, leveraging protein-protein interaction networks and sequence features.

tools.name: PPR-Meta
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for phage and plasmid identification in metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: PPR-Meta is a tool designed to identify phage and plasmid sequences from metagenomic fragments using a bi-path convolutional neural network, facilitating the analysis of mobile genetic elements.

tools.name: R-Predictor
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating plant disease resistance genes
tools.detailed_description: R-Predictor is a pipeline that utilizes deep protein language models and machine learning to identify and annotate plant disease resistance (R) genes from protein sequences.

tools.name: Mol-Instructions
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale biomolecular instruction dataset for LLMs
tools.detailed_description: Mol-Instructions is a comprehensive dataset designed to train Large Language Models (LLMs) on biomolecular tasks, including molecule generation, protein engineering, and chemical reaction prediction.
